cards.description: [ACTIVATED] Shuffle 1 or more 'Useless Potion' from your Grave into your Deck.
[ACTIVATED] Add 1 'Tainted Elixir' from your Grave to your Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Add 1 or more 'Wild Shot' from your Deck to your Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to this Champion then Add 1 'Copycat' from your Deck or Grave to Hand.
